trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName" /> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器中为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName" /> Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName> control renders a label that contains the name of the current user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName>控件呈现包含当前用户的名称的标签。

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName>控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner> class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner>类提供设计时支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName> to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>属性始终返回`true`，，该值指示设计器将创建关联的临时副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName>来生成设计时标记。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method provides the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName> at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法提供了用于呈现关联的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName>在设计时时出现错误。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner>类时创建关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName>控件或该控件的设计图面上的副本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 引发的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 提供发生错误后在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the markup used to render the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName" /> at design time after an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含发生错误后在设计时呈现关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName" /> 的标记。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs in trying to display the design-time view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName> control, this method returns the HTML markup to display a placeholder that contains the type name, the control name, and one or more messages describing the error.
trans-unit.target: 如果错误发生在中尝试显示的设计时视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName>控件，此方法返回的 HTML 标记，以显示包含类型名称、 控件名称和对错误进行描述的一个或多个消息的占位符。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy, rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer, to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指示设计器是否应使用临时副本，而不是与设计器关联的实际控件来生成设计时标记。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 总是为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is always `true`, the designer <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>属性始终是`true`，设计器<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>属性返回的关联副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName>控件来生成设计时标记。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property creates the copy by persisting the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName> control, then parsing the persisted control string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>属性通过保存的实际创建副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName>控件，然后再分析的持久化的控制字符串。

trans-unit.source: The copied control does not affect any persistence for the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName> control.
trans-unit.target: 复制的控件不会影响任何持久性的实际<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName>控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName> control itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>属性已被重写以返回`false`，设计器将使用关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName>控件本身来生成设计时标记，并对控件的设计时更改将保存到页标记源。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> property to return <see langword="false" /> or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginNameDesigner.UsePreviewControl" />属性以返回<see langword="false" />或者想要确定基于是否将控件标记具有类级别其值<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />对象。

trans-unit.source: If the actual <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName" /> control is used to generate the design time markup, the control may not be visible on the design surface, since the runtime behavior of the control is to not render if the user identity is not known.
trans-unit.target: 如果实际<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginName" />控件用来生成设计时标记，该控件因为控件的运行时行为是不呈现的用户标识如果未知，则可能不在设计图面上可见。
